thread.title: Jon Clare

author: Jon Clare
title: Jon Clare
text:
What more do you want? Hassle free and cheaper than Kwik fit I will certainly use them again.
I would have given 5* but we had a slight hicup in the start time as booked for 9am and they had it down as 9.45am, plus the wheel balance machine broke and they had to call another van out, but I wasn't in a rush so alls good this time, these things happen.
